mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.status AS "status", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_attendance( id, startdate, enddate, status, student_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{status}, #{studentId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
